name: Sokoban (micaluzbenitez)
description:
Sokoban

In this game you have to help you character to carry all the boxes to the boxes to the white crosses. As you progress you will encounter different obstacles:

- Holes: if you fall into any of them you lose, but if you throw a box inside them, you will cover them and go over the top normally.

- Red doors: on the map you will find a red button, if you put a box on the top of it, the red door will open.

- Brown doors: on the map you will find a key, if you get it, the brown door will open.

- Water: if you go over it, you will continue until there is no more water, the same will happen if you place a box in top.

GOOD LUCK!

From level 6 the stage turns to night!

You can choose your character!

Your score is saved between sessions!

Credits Programmer

Micaela Luz Benitez
